suppress.notes: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-1258 False positive -- we do not use Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE (5.0.8.RELEASE at the time of writing) Additionally, we do not use Spring method security annotations which are the specific vulnerability
